column1: Table A-217:  Total Land Areas for the Agricultural Soil C and N2O Inventory, Subdivided by Land Use Categories (Million Hectares)

Note: The area estimates are not consistent with the land area values shown in the Representation of the U.S. Land Base chapter because the current Inventory does not estimate emissions and removals for all managed lands. Specifically, grassland and cropland in Alaska are not included in the current Inventory.
